REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0592 reute d f BC-BANKEAST-CORP-<BENH> 03-02 0044

TEXT.TITLE: BANKEAST CORP <BENH> COMPLETES ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: BankEast Corp said it has completed the acquisition of United Banks Corp in an exchange of 1.86 BankEast shares for each United share. It said the acquisition is worth about 11.3 mln dlrs. Reuter
